title: Leftover lamb and spinach curry
ingredients: ['2cm piece root ginger', '1 onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic', '1 small red chilli, seeded', '2 tablespoons curry powder', '3 tablespoons sunflower oil', '3 handfuls fresh spinach', '1 tablespoon black mustard seeds', '3 carrots, sliced', '2 red peppers, seeded and chopped', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 (160ml) tin coconut milk', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '600g cooked lamb, diced', 'chopped fresh coriander, to taste']
